features: Spring-loaded clamp with locking button: the phone clamp secured by the locking button is stretchy from 2.6 inches to 3.8 inches (66 to 96 mm) due to its spring mechanism and compatible with iPhone 15/15 Pro/15 Pro Max 14 Pro Max 13 Pro Max 14 Plus 13 Mini 12 11 X XS Max Samsung Galaxy S 23/S22 3 Ultra Huawei Pixel 7 Pro and other mobile phones for selfies, live streaming, video calls, zoom meetings and vlogging

Quick release base of the Arca type: the base with Arca type dovetails can act as a quick release plate and slide into any tripod head and video head compatible with the Arca Swiss mounting system for instant and easy installation

Flexible position adjustment: with the clamp lock button, you can rotate the mobile phone 360° and rotate between vertical and horizontal position. You can also use the fine adjustment knob for accurate tilt angle adjustment at 180°

Soft rubber pads and cold shoe: Inside the phone clamp, curved rubber pads prevent your mobile phone from slipping and protect it from scratches. A hot shoe mount on the top can attach a small LED brightening light or microphone for improved recording quality

Effortless tripod connection: the lower 1/4 inch and 3/8 inch mounting threads can be connected to a wide range of tripods, monopods, light stands, table stands and handles to take razor-sharp images and videos

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replaced another model with Neewer
reviews.reviewText: Swapped from a different brand with a similar-looking design. This one better meets my needs/preferences. Some differences are more critical, others are more preference-based.Things to consider about this vs other options:-Tripod mounting plate on other model extended forward and impeded rotation of the phone to a vertical position unless the phone was clamped way off-center, which then made it unbalanced and less secure. Neewer's mounting plate extends backward, solving that problem; although, the clamp-lock on the Neewer will prevent 360° rotation, so neither model will be able to fully rotate freely all the way around.-Hinge for angling up or down on other model seemed like it might loosen over time and required an allen key to adjust the tension. Neewer put a small knurled knob here to tighten or loosen as needed.-Other model had one very prominent cold-shoe that can rotate. Neewer has very low-profile shoes, one on each end, that do not rotate.-Other model had front-facing 1/4" mounting holes on the arm; Neewer does not.-Neewer has detents at vertical and horizontal rotation positions; other does not.-Neewer's clamp design felt a bit more secure.-Overall, Neewer is a more established brand and their design just looks/feels more well-made to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024

reviews.reviewText: This product what's absolutely awesome but right onto my tripod and I was able to get beautiful pictures with my new phone. If you look close the black dot on the sun is actually a planet. Without this clip on a tripod I wound of never got this amazing picture. It works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This versatile phone mount has a spring clamp to keep your phone secure in either horizontal or vertical position.It also includes cold shoe mounts, which avails you if the opportunity to use a microphone or lightning or both to make what you are doing more professional looking.It was easy to set up and with the locking knobs you could keep it in the same position easily.It is one of the better mounts I have seen. The quality is good and there are several safety features to keep your phone safe and free from damage.
